sentences.english: Poems by Wordsworth , Gorge Gordon Byron and John Keats have long been favorites.
sentences.chinese: 华兹华斯，拜伦，济慈的诗歌一直为人们所钟爱。

sentences.english: There is a Boolean property that specifies if silent mode should be used.
sentences.chinese: 有一个拜伦逻辑值就是指定是否需要使用静声模式的。

sentences.english: Byron and Shelley are usually considered as the Second Generation of the Romanic Movement.
sentences.chinese: 拜伦和雪莱通常被认为是浪漫运动的第二代。

sentences.english: Byron's consumed memoirs possessed the merit of being well and entertainingly written.
sentences.chinese: 拜伦烧掉的文集集中了他写的好文章的精华。

sentences.english: And when Byron wonders “Where does the time go?
sentences.chinese: 而且，当拜伦在影片中问道“时间怎么过的这么快？”

sentences.english: This delay facilitated the Spanish victory in the Battle of Bailen in July.
sentences.chinese: 这耽搁有助西班牙军队在七月的拜伦战役中取胜。

sentences.english: He spent a week with Byron touring shipyards and factories.
sentences.chinese: 他花了整整一个星期时间跟拜伦一起参观船坞和工厂。

sentences.english: Byron quite casually said that he had 'a lot of Spenserian stanzas'.
sentences.chinese: 拜伦漫不经心地说，写了“许多斯宾塞诗节”。

sentences.english: She often quotes several lines of Byron in the class.
sentences.chinese: 她经常在课堂上引用几句拜伦的诗。

sentences.english: Byronic hero is one of his most important representatives of his literary contribution.
sentences.chinese: 创造了拜伦式的英雄是拜伦诗作的一个重要成就。

sentences.english: Byronic hero is one of his most important representatives of his literary contribution.
sentences.chinese: 创造了拜伦式的英雄是拜伦诗作的一个重要成就。

sentences.english: Byronic Hero In Film, Fiction, And Television.
sentences.chinese: 电影，小说，电视中的拜伦式英雄。

sentences.english: Even the tormented Byron seemed to enjoy himself in this celestial mountainscenery.
sentences.chinese: 即使是有些哀怨的拜伦似乎都很享受这里的仙境。

sentences.english: He himself is the editor of the new standard works of Byron.
sentences.chinese: 他自己是拜伦新的优秀作品的编辑。

sentences.english: A Comparative Research on the Three Bird Poems of Wordsworth, Shelly and Keats;
sentences.chinese: 华兹华斯，拜伦，济慈的诗歌一直为人们所钟爱。

sentences.english: "Yes, sir, " said Byron, "and mules are sterile. "
sentences.chinese: “不错，先生，”拜伦说，“可是骡子不能传种接代。

Jean-Paul Sartre (1905-1980), French existential philosopher and novelist

Alexandr Sergeevich Pushkin (1799-1837), great Russian romantic poet
